```{r}
nrow(demenCircleGraph) # = 353
subset(demenCircleGraph, CDR != 0)

# CDR 이 0 이 아닌 사람들만 카운트 = 치매판정 환자 수 
nrow(subset(demenCircleGraph, CDR != 0)) # = 148

```

```{r}
# 치매판정 환자 수 중 남녀 비율 확인 
nrow(subset(demenCircleGraph, CDR != 0 & SexCode == 1)) # = 86
nrow(subset(demenCircleGraph, CDR != 0 & SexCode == 0)) # = 62
# 86+62 = 148

```

```{r}
makeCharF <- round(nrow(subset(demenCircleGraph, CDR != 0 & SexCode == 1))/nrow(subset(demenCircleGraph, CDR != 0)),2) # = 0.58
makeCharM <- round(nrow(subset(demenCircleGraph, CDR != 0 & SexCode == 0))/nrow(subset(demenCircleGraph, CDR != 0)),2) # = 0.42
```

```{r}
dfMC <- as.data.frame(makeChart$SexCode)
dfMC$nrow <- c(makeCharF,makeCharM)
dfMC
```

label

```{r}
ratio <- round((dfMC$nrow / sum(dfMC$nrow)*100) , 2)
ratio
```

```{r}
label <- paste(dfMC$`makeChart$SexCode`,"\n",ratio,"%")
label
```

```{r}
par(family = "AppleGothic")

pie3D(
  dfMC$nrow,
  labels = label,
  #Labelcex = 0.4,
 
  main ="치매환자 성별 비율 그래프",
  radius = 0.8,
  height = 0.09,
      border = "black",
   explode = 0.04,
    
)

legend(
  #.9,-.4,
  "topright",
       legend=c("여자","남자"),
       fill=c("red","blue"),
       border="white",
       box.lty=1,
       cex=1.0)
```
